Let me try and disspell some of the description.

Notes:

--No Crack yet, it will be tough for it to be out before March 9th (Not sure why)

--This file may be updated, if it is the file size won't change much as it'd be updated to include the crack which won't be a significant increase/decrease in size.

--This file, that does not include the crack, comes without the main EXE b/c you need the crack so including the main EXE does you no good.  When the crack is available you will want to place it in the BinariesWin32 folder.

--Apparently we may need a specific compression program, FreeArc to extract the files.  Also, it will take a large amount of RAM and you will want to ensure that most programs are shut down prior to extracting so that it does not cause a system hang.

--There is nothing ripped out of the files, other than the main EXE, the videos do work.  

I think that's the best way I can transcribe the original description.

FYI: The "Globe" on the end of this title if b/c of the uploader.  And, perhaps the Portable is because of the compressed file size.

@globe::  the fix.exe was made by some person LYXER aka Gomzirule and was posted in one of the forums.... just picked it up from there....
and as the black_box version has the same problem with there videos... they used this software too....

for curiousity's sake this is the code for fix.exe if you dont wanna dwnload fix.exe run this code as a bat file inside movies folder
@echo off
setlocal EnableDelayedExpansion
for %%i in (*.bik) do (
set /a sz=%%~zi*3
echo !sz!
fsutil file createnew "%%~dpni" !sz!
move "%%i" "%%i.bak"
copy /b "%%i.bak" +"%%~dpni" "%%i"
del /f /q "%%~dpni"
)
cls
echo.
echo.  Done !
echo.
echo   -Lyx
echo.
pause
